sentence.Network_en: There was a triptych of pale oak.

sentence.Network_en: The triptych marked Rubens'sensational introduction of the Baroque style into Northern art.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (denoting a set of three writing tablets hinged or tied together): from tri- 'three', on the pattern of diptych

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 游戏名称：Triptych 发售公司：ALcot 发售时间：2006.4.28游戏简介 住在城外的洋馆里的少年那由他，他以类似侦探的事务为生。有一天，从平时的老搭档的线人那里送来了一份请求。“据说在孤岛中央的学园里，秘密地举行着奇怪的仪式，希望去调查一下真相”。没有过去的记忆，有着心里好像开了一个洞一样的丧失感的那由他，对这份委托感到哪里不对劲，于是就接受了下来。 借助黑夜，潜入了学园的那由他，在那里，他遇见了学

entry.def: A triptych is a painting or a carving on three panels that are usually joined together by hinges.

means.word_mean: 1. art consisting of a painting or carving (especially an altarpiece) on three panels (usually hinged together)
